function.description: turns by a given number of degrees

parameter.name: dir
parameter.paramDescription: where to place the marker. options are: 'forward', 'backward' or 'below'

parameter.name: red
parameter.paramDescription: boolean to decide whether the marker will be red or not.

function.description: places a marker in a given position
returns true if byte is at the goal, returns false if not
returns an object containing the distance and name of the object sensed by the forward sensor
returns an object containing the distance and name and number of markers sensed by the forward sensor
returns an object containing the distance and name of the object sensed by the backward marker sensor
returns an object containing the distance and name and number of markers sensed by the backward sensor
returns an object containing the distance and name of the object sensed by the left sensor
returns an object containing the distance and name and number of markers sensed by the left sensor
returns an object containing the distance and name of the object sensed by the right sensor
returns an object containing the distance and name and number of markers sensed by the right sensor
returns an object containing the x, y and z position of byte

parameter.name: dir
parameter.paramDescription: Directions around Byte, values of direction limited to “forward”, “left” or “right”.

function.description: Returns the x, y coordinates of the cell nearest to Byte in the given direction.
